pr_title: Fix casting error while executing process(1.2.x)

timeline.message: Fix casting error while executing process

timeline.author: MaryamZi

replies.bodyText: This error type is something we missed in previous releases. I think it is better to correct this now. There is an issue if the users handled it at a low level.
replies.author: daneshk

replies.bodyText: Or we will reuse existing error type for patch release and correct it in minor release
replies.author: daneshk

replies.bodyText: Yeah, +1. We'll still have the details right? Only the reason will be incorrect.
replies.author: MaryamZi

timeline.bodyText: Are we using this constant anywhere? Shall we rename it?
timeline.author: aashikam

replies.bodyText: This is a temporary fix for a patch release. I did it this way to minimize the changes. I introduced a new error type called ProcessExecError in the master branch.
replies.author: daneshk
